name: 4.1 "Birth, Death, Love and Rice" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who joined the cast this season as Woody Boyd?
questions.explanation:
Woody Harrelson.

	Woody Harrelson replaced Nicholas Colasanto on "Cheers" after Colasanto died the season before from a heart attack. Woody Harrelson was born July 23, 1961 in Texas. His father was in prison for murder. Woody Harrelson is a vegan and raw foodist. He strongly supports the legalization of marijuana. Harrelson has also been on "Will and Grace" as Grace's boyfriend Nathan. He has also been in several movies including "Doc Hollywood" and "White Man Can't Jump".

questions.text: What was the first line spoken by Woody Boyd?
questions.explanation:
This is amazing.

	Woody Boyd was from Indiana. His trip to Boston was his first time in a big city.

questions.text: Why did Woody come to Cheers?
options: To see a Red Sox game
To get a job at Cheers
questions.explanation:
To meet Coach.

	Woody and Coach were pen pals. Woody explains that they exchange pens, which was Coach's idea.

questions.text: Did Frasier and Diane get married?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Frasier explained that the priest asked if she wanted to marry Frasier. She asked if he was talking to her. When the priest said, "yes", Diane ran away.

questions.text: What was it called in "Italy in soccer when a player kicks a ball, misses and falls down" according to Frasier?
questions.explanation:
a Frasier.

	Calcio is the Italian word for soccer. Frasier goes on to explain that if the person loses consciousness when he falls it is called "a Frasier Crane".

questions.text: Who pulled a gun on Sam?
options: a robber who came in late at night
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Sam knew the gun was unloaded because the holes in the gun were empty. Frasier blamed Sam for his breakup with Diane.

Dr. Bennett Ludlow

	Ludlow was on the show in a previous episode where he dated Carla and got her pregnant. Frasier had said before that Dr. Ludlow was his mentor.

a convent.

	Frasier told Sam this in Sam's office. Sam agreed not to go see her, but of course he did go see her. Diane said that even though she was not a nun, the sisters took her in.

questions.text: What did Sam tell Diane he did that was romantic?
questions.correct: He flew to Italy to stop her from marrying Frasier.
options: He bought her a diamond ring.
He had her name tattooed on his body.
He painted a mural of her on his bedroom wall.
questions.explanation:
He flew to Italy to stop her from marrying Frasier.

	Sam claimed in the beginning of the episode that he wanted nothing to do with Diane. However, as is a recurring theme on the show, Sam and Diane can't stand each other but they can't stand to be apart from each other either.

questions.text: When Diane asked God for a sign what did she believe to be the sign?
questions.correct: Sam asked if there was a men's room.
options: Sam gave her a raise to return to Cheers.
questions.explanation:
Sam asked if there was a men's room.

	Diane replied to Sam, "Would you put a men's room in a convent." Sam answered, "Right about now I would, yes." Diane then goes back to talking to God saying it doesn't have to be a big sign and then realizes she got her sign.
